amendment.description: To require a report assessing risks posed by ceasing support operations with respect to the conflict between the Saudi-led coalition and the Houthis in Yemen.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4090 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4090 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S7556; text: CR S7556) To require a report assessing risks posed by ceasing support operations with respect to the conflict between the Saudi-led coalition and the Houthis in Yemen.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4090 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4090 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
